story:
Once upon a time in a peaceful village in Iraq, there lived a young boy named Ali. Ali was a curious and kind-hearted child who loved to explore the world around him.

One night, as Ali was getting ready for bed, he saw a shooting star through his bedroom window. Excited, he made a wish before closing his eyes and drifting off to sleep.

In his dream, Ali found himself in a beautiful garden filled with colorful flowers and sparkling lights. A wise owl perched on a nearby tree and told Ali that he had been chosen to embark on a special adventure.

The owl led Ali through the enchanted garden and into a magical forest where they encountered friendly animals and mystical creatures. Together, they solved puzzles, overcame challenges, and learned valuable lessons about bravery, friendship, and kindness.

As they journeyed through the forest, Ali and the owl discovered a hidden treasure that granted wishes to those who truly believed in their hearts. With tears of joy in his eyes, Ali wished for a world filled with love, peace, and happiness for all living beings.

When Ali woke up the next morning, he felt a sense of warmth and contentment in his heart. He knew that even though the magical adventure was just a dream, the values he learned would guide him through his life's journey.

And so, every night before bed, Ali would gaze up at the stars and remember the magical forest, the wise owl, and the treasure of kindness and compassion that he carried in his heart.

From that day on, Ali lived his life spreading love and positivity wherever he went, making the world a better place one small act of kindness at a time.

And so, dear child, always remember the power of kindness, the magic of dreams, and the beauty of believing in the goodness of your heart. Sweet dreams and may your wishes come true, just like Ali's did in his enchanted adventure. Goodnight.
